title: Liliana1304
author: Liliana1304
content: Miss Orire Agbaje nah the 400l Economics student of Ibadan wey don gain employment under Tinubu regime as member of the Presidential Committee on Fiscal Policy and Tax Reforms and some people go dey wonder why she dey so special to gain such a favor. Here nah few reasons;1- She get a strong interest in tax policy2- President of the Nigerian Universities Tax Club Association of Accounting Technicians3- One of the Nigerians selected for Nigeria Higher Education Foundation4- She get passion for crunching numbers and that's the reason for studying Accounting/ Taxation.This na welcome development becos we presido don at least recognize the youths and she dey passionate about using her skills to making a difference using this Tax Reforms as a platform. Una feel say dis na over ambition for her side? Considering as nah just member and not chairman wey she be? how tax reform take come about The Mandate Them get the mandate to address the challenges faced by Nigerians in the areas of fiscal governance, tax reforms and growth facilitation.How una see dis appointment? Godfatherism get hand or she just get the right qualifications for the job?https://www.vanguardngr.com/2023/08/tinubu-appoints-400-level-ui-student-agbaje-as-member-of-tax-reforms-committee/

Una feel say dis na over ambition for her side? Considering as nah just member and not chairman wey she be? how tax reform take come about The Mandate Them get the mandate to address the challenges faced by Nigerians in the areas of fiscal governance, tax reforms and growth facilitation.How una see dis appointment? Godfatherism get hand or she just get the right qualifications for the job?https://www.vanguardngr.com/2023/08/tinubu-appoints-400-level-ui-student-agbaje-as-member-of-tax-reforms-committee/She will help "widen the tax net..." I do not have problem with the appointment, but in a country where foreign companies are leaving, SME are closing and job losses happening at an alarming rate, taxation should not be the main focus of government rather the economy. If you fix the economy, create jobs and businesses for people, then it becomes easier to tax people and they will happily pay. If we continue like this, we might resort to the dark old days of government moving from village to village arresting people because of tax. Well, wetin concern a hungry man with tax!

So unless say dem go use politics use drop her one side as this country things dy sabi dy side ways, if not where she they as member she go bring idea to the table way go help reform the tax system. Unless say them go just turn am to some kind ceremonial member where she dy their but nah other piple way dy for back Nia they truly they pilot the ship. Still on still eh good say d presido consider the youth to the productive to some level, make we just they hope for better appointment way fit hit other youths, maybe from their few youth fit enter ministerial position, we fit from their dy climb small small. Miracle no they tire Jesus.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Liliana1304 on August 09, 2023, 08:26:52 AMMiss Orire Agbaje nah the 400l Economics student of Ibadan wey don gain employment under Tinubu regime as member of the Presidential Committee on Fiscal Policy and Tax Reforms and some people go dey wonder why she dey so special to gain such a favor. And for me, I think it will be far more better if her nomination is not politically inclined (i.e to last only within the timeframe of this new administration. But if she is been given a permanent federal job appointment to take effect the moment she finishes her final year. Then this will be a welcome development.

comments.author: Noson
comments.body: This isn't just great news Miss Orire Agbaje alone but to many young Nigerians out there. News like this go inspire hard work, creativity, excellence and self-development beyond studying to pass an exam but studying to make impact. I am proud of her and I hope say her appointment go bring young positive input to our nation no matter how little it is. Because na small drops na im ocean take dey form. However, make our presido still reason other aspects of the economy when go promote well being of the masses. He seems to be more been on taxation, which isn't so bad.  But na who get reasonable price of income dey pay tax. That being said, policies that promotes well-being first must be considered alongside his deep interest in taxation. Make hungry no go finish average man o! Congrats to Miss Orire Agbaje. Laslas, education no be scam.

comments.body: Quote from: Liliana1304 on August 09, 2023, 08:26:52 AMHow una see dis appointment? Godfatherism get hand or she just get the right qualifications for the job?At some point, we need to dey look beyond godfatherism in d country. I dey very sure say dem no go give her dis kind delicate appointment if she no get any idea about am. Dis na very delicate position and dem gatz give am to person wey dey capable of handling am. As you talk am, godfatherism fit dey among the tins wey make her get am but I still feel say she dey capable neh datz why dem give her. We pray make she discharge are duty well, because on how she do her work well fit determine if d government go consider more youths for some kind positions for the government which we want make e be so.Quote from: Gozie51 on August 09, 2023, 08:48:57 PMWe suppose dey see say this government no mean well for the masses. His style of governance has been like that even while in Lagos as governor. You dey serious about taxing people while economy dey fall daily. See cooking gas don begin dey add money.If you look the matter ba, no be only dis part him don put focus on but base on say the masses dey hungry, no doubt we go show our anger about d matter and go like disapprove with any oda tin wey him wan do for d country. I still dey reason say make we see how dis government go be after him one year in office. To transform a country like Nigeria after all d tinz wey don crumble no easy sha. But make we see how him go turn tinz around, make we give am more time before we go begin criticize fully for failing as a president or did well as a president. I just get one believe say, with every hardship comes ease. I pray our own go be the same soon.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: Congratulations to her, the best will always come to those who are prepared by doing their best in what they have best interest on. Passion and flexibility is a great tool for achieving extraordinary result. This tunubu government is now becoming interesting to young people as they find expression among his carbinent. I commend the president for such a move even though the country is hard. Mr president should hasten up to make things right as he engage talented and vibrant youth in his administration.

comments.author: lagosnoir
comments.body: They turned a presidential taskforce on taxation into an internship opportunity. Unfortunately, that was not the worst appointment into that committee. They also appointed a UK based PR professional. I know the committee is going to work towards an already determined answer, but they should at least pretend that they are serious about government work.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: I must congratulate her, it is a good one, the major thing is is do she really deserve it, if yes, then it is a welcome development, I don't think that the constitution barred the president from appointing a serving corp member into any position, so it is a welcome development, though it is my first time of noticing such but then it is better for a youth to be in positions more than our aged father's, who are bent on making series of anti people's policies, the right things needs to be done in our political terrain, the country has to think differently to make things right.
